mapper.select: SELECT user_sn AS userSn, user_name AS userName, email, password, gender, address, zip_code AS zipCode, telno FROM user WHERE user_sn = #{userSn}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_name = #{userName}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, gender = #{gender}, address = #{address}, zip_code = #{zipCode}, telno = #{telno}, use_yn = 'Y' WHERE user_sn = #{userSn}
mapper.select: SELECT j.jutaek_name AS jutaekName, jd.jutaek_size AS jutaekSize, j.jutaek_address AS jutaekAddress, gd.gongo_type AS gongoType FROM favorite f JOIN jutaek_dtl jd ON f.jutaek_dtl_sn = jd.jutaek_dtl_sn JOIN jutaek j ON jd.jutaek_sn = j.jutaek_sn LEFT JOIN gongo_dtl gd ON f.gongo_sn = gd.gongo_sn WHERE f.user_sn = #{userSn}
